page.title: 02LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Farnworth Police Station covers Kearsley,Farnworth,Little Lever and part of Great Lever.In charge of Farnworth Police Station is Superintendent Orrell,there are 8 detectives and one of the detectives is a woman.At the police station there are 3 male cells,1 female cell and a detention room for children under the age of 17.Usually there are 1or2 locked up each day,there are usually 2 in each cell but more people could be fitted in.{The most common crime is {theft or burglary and the most common {offence is vandalism or trouble with {youths.}There is quite a lot of crime in Farnworth and mostly the people are under the age of 17. For foot patrols there is 2 in Farnworth centre,1 in Kearsley and 1 in Little Lever.The rest of the area is covered by car.
